title: Kevin Hart Interview and more
itunes:title: Kevin Hart Interview and more
description:
Tuesday 6/6- Today on the show we had comedian and good friend to the show Kevin Hart come by where he spilled some tea about the things he is talking about in his new book "I Can't Make This Up". Also, we let our listeners rant about their ex during our segment Ex Files and Charlamagne gave Donkey of the day to a guy that let his flexing on ig get his house raided by cops.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
